Name: Colorgrid
About the game: Colorgrid is a puzzle game about mixing colors in a Lab. Find the correct positions for your lasers and mirrors to get the right mix of colors in each material. 70 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity. Originally composed music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles Learn the basics of color mixing to solve the levels.
